meanings.definition: To cover with a new roof.
meanings.sent1: He reroofs his house every ten years to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew reroofs the building after the storm damage.
meanings.sent3: The handyman reroofs the doghouse, making it fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: The fresh coat of paint reroofs the old barn, giving it new life.
meanings.sent5: She reroofs her shed with colorful shingles to match her garden.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing or repairing a roof.
meanings.sent1: The reroofs of the neighborhood houses brought a sense of renewal.
meanings.sent2: After the hailstorm, many homes needed reroofs to fix the damage.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best reroofs in town was fierce among roofers.
meanings.sent4: The reroofs of the school buildings symbolized progress and care.
meanings.sent5: The company specializes in quick and efficient reroofs for businesses.
